title: Trại hè quốc tế Point Avenue: Huấn luyện thế hệ kiến tạo tương lai - Summer Leaders Camp 2021
excerpt: There is no better leadership camp in Vietnam than Point Avenue's Summer Leaders Camp (SLC). Located at the base of Yen Tu mountain & designed by an incredible team of experts, SLC provides an immersive, technology limited (no cellphones) environment focused on personal growth through academic rigor, physical training, global citizenry, & character development.[…]

title: A throwback to Summer Boot Camp - Trại Hè Tiếng Anh 2021
excerpt: A throwback to Summer Boot Camp Trại Hè Tiếng Anh 2021 của Point Avenue mang đến cho các em học sinh trải nghiệm học tập trong một môi trường hạn chế công nghệ, với trọng tâm là phát triển toàn diện từng học sinh thông qua những hoạt động học tập, rèn luyện thể chất và hoàn thiện nhân cách.[…]

title: College Talk - How we made it: Speaker Introduction - Viet Dung
excerpt: With experience training hundreds of students to achieve an average score in the top 5% of the world, Point Avenue teachers will personalize the test prep roadmap for each student to help them quickly achieve their dream score.[…]

title: Trại hè Tranh biện chuyên sâu - 2021 Summer Debate Intensive Camp
excerpt: Receive the top-notch instruction by Head Coach of Team Vietnam for World Schools Debating Championships. It's a premier summer program where students learn and advance their communication skills, critical thinking, collaboration, and create solutions to an ever-changing world. Unleash your voice through the debate tournament at the end of summer![…]

title: Trại hè Tiếng Anh Tiểu học - Elementary 2021 Summer Day Camp - The Global Citizen
excerpt: Elementary 2021 Summer Day Camp - The Global Citizen Summer Day Camp offers a series of theme-based courses including Nature Warriors, Journalism, Globetrotters, and Facing Conflict. By utilizing a holistic approach, students will experience classes that focus on academics, morals, social-emotional development, and physical training in a safe and supportive environment.[…]

title: College Talk - How we made it: Speaker Introduction - Viet Dung
excerpt: Watch this video and don't forget to join our seminar "College Talk - How we made it" to hear more from Dung on 23 May[…]

title: College Talk - How we made it: Speaker Introduction - Lam Dinh
excerpt: Meet Lam Dinh, a tech-lover who has just won the Presidental Scholarship (Full-ride) worth $300.000 from Villanova University! Lam came to us quite late in the application season, after being introduced to Point Avenue by his friends at Hanoi - Amsterdam. After just one meeting with his future mentor, Mr. John, Lam declared "My three hours with John were more productive than the last three months combined".[…]

title: What is Point Avenue?
excerpt: With Point Avenue's one-year anniversary approaching, we would like to look back and reflect on how much our family has grown over the past year, and what this place means for all of us.[…]

title: ELEMENTARY PROGRAM
excerpt: The Elementary Program aims to foster student curiosity and develop foundational English skills from Kindergarten to Grade 5.[…]

title: Get your SAT Dream Score with Point Avenue Test Prep program!
excerpt: I have been attending SAT Advanced Class at Point Avenue for about 3 months, and I have improved up to 200-250 points - Duong Phuong Linh, Junior Student at Hanoi - Amsterdam High School. […]
